post.description:
Only enrollments with statuses Active and Awaiting can be cancelled.
            If current user is a learner in a course, only their own enrollment can be cancelled.
If current user is a learner in a course, only their own enrollment can be retaken.
Allowed for learners enrolled via AD group into course with option 'Enroll user into a single course session' only.

CourseId.description: Course id that assignment is related to

Course.description: Course entity that assignment is related to

AssignmentTasks.description: List of assignment tasks. Id current user is learner, only their task will be visible

CourseCatalogId.description: Id of Course Catalog that course is related to

ShowInCatalog.description: Show course in catalog or not

CourseType.description: Course Type: ELearning, Blended, ClassRoom, TrainingPlan

CertificateTemplateId.description: Id of certificate template associated with course

CourseCatalog.description: Course Catalog entity that course is related to

Enrollments.description: List of course enrollments. If current user is learner, only their enrollment will be visible

Quizzes.description: List of Quizzes associated with course. List will have items only in case if current user has active enrollment on the course

Scorms.description: List of Scorms associated with course. List will have items only in case if current user has active enrollment on the course

LearningModules.description: List of Learning Modules associated with course. List will have items only in case if current user has active enrollment on the course

Assignments.description: List of Assignments associated with course. List will have items only in case if current user has active enrollment on the course

ExternalApps.description: List of External Apps associated with course. List will have items only in case if current user has active enrollment on the course

SharepointWeb.description: SharePoint Site associated with this course

EnrollmentRequests.description: List of course enrollment requests. If current user is learner, only their enrollment requests will be visible

Categories.description: List of Categories associated with course

Tags.description: List of Tags associated with course

Apps.description: List of apps added to course

MaxAttendees.description: Max attendees at course when CourseSessionEnrollmentType is EnrollToAll

LearningItems.description: List of learning items, associated with the course. Public, descriptive information.

CourseSessionRequests.description: List of session requests, associated with the course.

ProvisioningProgress.description: Provides provisioning status for the course.

WaitingListEnabled.description: Is Waiting List functionality enabled for course or not

UnenrollDisabled.description: Is unenroll action disabled for the course

CourseTargetingEnabled.description: Is Course Targeting enabled for the course

IsRetakeAllowed.description: Is Allowed to Learner to Retake Training

EnrollmentDeadline.description: Deadline for enrollment to all sessions

AssignmentId.description: Id of assignment that this task is related to

UserLoginName.description: Login name of user that this task is related to

User.description: User entity that this task is related to

Assignment.description: Assignment entity that this task is related to

DefaultCourseBannerImageUrl.description: URL of image that is used as a default banner for Course and Training Plan home pages in this Course Catalog

Courses.description: List of courses that this catalog contains

SharepointWeb.description: SharePoint Site associated with this course catalog

Users.description: Reserved for future use. Is empty for now.

CourseId.description: Id of course that enrollment is related to

UserId.description: Id of user that enrollment is related to

UserLoginName.description: Login name of user that enrollment is related to

CertificateId.description: Id of certificate that was acquired within this enrollment

CEU.description: Continuing education units that were earner within this enrollment

DecimalCEU.description: Continuing education units that were earner within this enrollment as decimal

DueDate.description: Due Date, if configured for course

EndDate.description: End Date, if configured for course

CanUnenroll.description: Can learner cancel enrollment or not

CancellationReason.description: Reason why enrollment was cancelled. Filled by learner or teacher.

CourseSessionId.description: Course Session Id that enrollment is related to

Course.description: Course entity that enrollment is related to

User.description: User entity that enrollment is related to

Certificate.description: Certificate entity that was acquired within this enrollment

QuizUserStatuses.description: List of quiz progress statuses for user within this enrollment

ScormUserStatuses.description: List of scorm progress statuses for user within this enrollment

LearningModuleUserStatuses.description: List of learning module progress statuses for user within this enrollment

ExternalAppUserStatuses.description: List of external app progress statuses for user within this enrollment

Attendances.description: List of attendances for user within this enrollment

AssignmentTasks.description: List of assignment tasks for user within this enrollment

CourseSession.description: Course Session that enrollment is related to

MaxAttemptsLimit.description: Max possible number of attempts for this quiz

PassingPercentage.description: Percentage that user needs to get to pass this quiz

AllowReview.description: Allow learner to review their attempt after completion or not

AllowNavigation.description: Allow learner to navigate between questions during passing quiz
